Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 1: Multi-user authentication implementation

This commit completes Phase 1 of the PRO features implementation,
adding full multi-user authentication and project/issue ownership.

Models Updated:
- User: Added Devise authentication modules \(database_authenticatable,
  registerable, recoverable, rememberable, validatable, trackable\)
- User: Added role enum \(admin/member\) with Rails 8.1 syntax
- User: Added multi-user associations \(project_memberships, owned_projects,
  created_issues, assigned_issues\)
- User: Added helper methods \(admin?, display_name, initials\)

- ProjectMembership: NEW model with role enum \(owner/editor/viewer\)
- ProjectMembership: Permission methods \(can_edit?, can_manage_members?\)

- Project: Added owner association and project_memberships
- Project: Added accessible_by scope and permission methods
- Project: Added callback to create owner membership on project creation

- Issue: Added creator and assigned_user associations
- Issue: Added scopes \(assigned_to, created_by, unassigned\)
- Issue: Added ransackable attributes for creator_id and assigned_user_id
- Issue: Added assignment methods \(assigned?, assign_to, unassign\)

Controllers Updated:
- ApplicationController: Replaced custom current_user with Devise authentication
- ApplicationController: Added before_action :authenticate_user!
- ProjectsController: Set project.owner = current_user on create
- Projects::IssuesController: Set issue.creator = current_user on create
- Visualizations::IssuesController: Set issue.creator = current_user on create

Routes Updated:
- Added devise_for :users at top of routes
- Wrapped all application routes in authenticate :user block
- All routes now require authentication

Database & Configuration:
- Migrations executed for Devise fields, ownership, and memberships
- Database schemas updated \(primary, cable, queue\)
- Created config/database.yml for multi-database support
- Admin user migrated with credentials \(admin@eigenfocus.local\)

Devise Views:
- Generated all Devise views \(login, signup, password reset, etc.\)
- 14 view files added for authentication flows

Docker Configuration:
- Updated docker-compose.yml to bypass entrypoint issues
- Fixed enum syntax for Rails 8.1 compatibility
- Rails server successfully running on port 3000

Testing:
- Rails server boots successfully
- Solid Queue working properly
- Authentication system active and functional

- Phase 3: Custom Issue Statuses & Types
- Phase 4: Views as Projections
- Phase 5: Grid View
